luminary_fragment_hunt.title: Echoes of the Luminaries
luminary_fragment_hunt.description: Reports indicate a Luminary fragment has manifested in the Echo Woods. Various factions are racing to obtain it, and the Harmonic Order has tasked you with retrieving it before it falls into dangerous hands.

objectives.description: Find the location of the Luminary fragment in Echo Woods
objectives.completion_criteria: Discover the Whispering Grove location where the fragment is hidden

objectives.description: Defeat the Cipher Remnant agents attempting to claim the fragment
objectives.completion_criteria: Defeat all Cipher Remnant agents in the area

objectives.description: Retrieve the Luminary fragment
objectives.completion_criteria: Collect the Luminary fragment

objectives.description: Return the fragment to the Resonance Sage in Harmonia
objectives.completion_criteria: Deliver the Luminary fragment to the Resonance Sage

resonance_crisis.title: Dangerous Frequencies
resonance_crisis.description: A small frontier settlement is experiencing unusually violent Resonance Events. The Harmonic Order needs someone to investigate the cause and protect the community during these unpredictable phenomena.

objectives.description: Travel to the affected settlement near Echo Woods
objectives.completion_criteria: Arrive at Woodhaven Settlement

objectives.description: Investigate the unusual Resonance patterns in three locations around the settlement
objectives.completion_criteria: Investigate all three anomaly sites

objectives.description: Identify the source of the Resonance disruption
objectives.completion_criteria: Find the Dissonant Path device causing the disruptions

objectives.description: Confront the Dissonant Path member responsible for the disruption
objectives.completion_criteria: Defeat the Dissonant Path member

objectives.description: Use Planar Anchoring techniques to stabilize the area during the next Resonance Event
objectives.completion_criteria: Complete the anchoring ritual at the village center

planar_expedition.title: Beyond the Veil
planar_expedition.description: A research team from the Harmonic Order is mounting an expedition to explore a newly discovered Planar Bleed Zone. They need additional security and assistance to catalog the unique resources and phenomena within the zone.

objectives.description: Meet with the research team at their camp near The Convergence
objectives.completion_criteria: Find and speak with the research team at their camp

objectives.description: Escort the research team safely into the Planar Bleed Zone
objectives.completion_criteria: Protect all researchers during travel to the convergence perimeter

objectives.description: Collect samples from three different areas within the zone
objectives.completion_criteria: Collect all required samples

objectives.description: Defend the research camp from planar hybrid creatures
objectives.completion_criteria: Defeat all attacking creatures

objectives.description: Help researchers document a major planar anomaly at the center of the zone
objectives.completion_criteria: Complete documentation of the planar anomaly

lost_knowledge.title: Pages Through Time
lost_knowledge.description: The Shifting Library contains crucial information about stabilizing Resonance Events, but the needed texts only become accessible during a specific planar alignment. You need to obtain the required authorization and retrieve the knowledge before time runs out.

objectives.description: Obtain authorization to access the Shifting Library from the Council of Resonance
objectives.completion_criteria: Convince the Council to grant library access

objectives.description: Retrieve a focusing crystal from the Crystalline Enclave to help locate the texts
objectives.completion_criteria: Obtain the focusing crystal

objectives.description: Travel to the Shifting Library during the planar alignment
objectives.completion_criteria: Reach the library during the alignment event

objectives.description: Navigate the constantly changing layout of the library to find the Pre-Shattering Archive
objectives.completion_criteria: Solve the navigation puzzle of the shifting stacks

objectives.description: Find the texts about Resonance stabilization in the Pre-Shattering Archive
objectives.completion_criteria: Locate and retrieve the Resonance Codex

objectives.description: Escape the library as the planar alignment ends and sections begin disappearing
objectives.completion_criteria: Reach the library entrance with the codex before time runs out

merchant_protection.title: Valuable Cargo
merchant_protection.description: The Mercantile Chord is transporting a shipment of rare Resonant Materials between trading hubs and needs protection from bandits and natural hazards.

objectives.description: Meet with the merchant caravan in Harmonia
objectives.completion_criteria: Meet and speak with the caravan master

objectives.description: Escort the caravan to the Crystalline Enclave
objectives.completion_criteria: Safely escort the caravan to its destination

objectives.description: Protect the caravan from bandit attacks along the route
objectives.completion_criteria: Defeat all bandit groups that attack the caravan

objectives.description: Help the caravan safely navigate through a minor Resonance flux zone
objectives.completion_criteria: Successfully guide the caravan through the flux zone

objectives.description: Ensure the cargo is safely delivered to the Crystalline Enclave
objectives.completion_criteria: Complete delivery to the Consortium representative

resonance_touched.title: Fragmented Self
resonance_touched.description: A citizen of Harmonia has returned from a Resonance Event changed, possibly merged with an alternate version of themselves. They're experiencing 'Resonance sickness' and need help integrating their fragmented identity.

objectives.description: Meet with the Resonance-touched patient in the Attunement Hall
objectives.completion_criteria: Meet and speak with the affected citizen

objectives.description: Collect Erdium crystals to help with the reattunement ritual
objectives.completion_criteria: Gather the required erdium crystals

objectives.description: Help the patient recover memories from before the Resonance Event
objectives.completion_criteria: Find all three memory locations in Harmonia

objectives.description: Assist the Attunement Master in performing a reattunement ritual
objectives.completion_criteria: Successfully complete the reattunement ritual

objectives.description: Check on the patient after a few days to ensure the treatment worked
objectives.completion_criteria: Follow up with the citizen to confirm recovery

551cdb35-a4bb-4b23-b6c1-4d2772947efb.title: Whispers of the Ash Plane (Ashen Covenant Recruit)
551cdb35-a4bb-4b23-b6c1-4d2772947efb.description: The Ashen Elder has tasked you with your first practical Ash Walking ritual. The Covenant needs to find a new, safe migration path, and the Elder believes a long-dead ancestor holds the key within the Ash Plane. You must project your consciousness, seek the ancestral spirit, and glean crucial information to guide your people.

objectives.description: Gather specific ritual ashes from the designated area near the Ashen Camp.
objectives.completion_criteria: Collect the required ritual ashes for the Ash Walking ceremony.

objectives.description: Perform the guided Ash Walking ritual at the sacred altar within the Ashen Camp.
objectives.completion_criteria: Successfully initiate the Ash Walking ritual and project your consciousness.

objectives.description: Within the Ash Plane, seek out the ancestral spirit and glean information about a safe migration path.
objectives.completion_criteria: Obtain the cryptic message or vision from the ancestral spirit.

objectives.description: Return to your body and consult with the Ashen Elder to interpret the ancestral message.
objectives.completion_criteria: Discuss the ancestral message with the Ashen Elder to understand its meaning.

objectives.description: Based on the interpreted ancestral guidance, scout the new migration path in Echo Woods.
objectives.completion_criteria: Locate and assess the viability of the new migration path as indicated by the ancestor.

the-first-exchange.title: The First Exchange
the-first-exchange.description: A local merchant in Harmonia needs a small, important package delivered to a contact in the Verdant Embassy. This simple task will serve as your first foray into the world's commerce.

objectives.description: Collect the delivery package from the Merchant Guild Representative in Harmonia.
objectives.completion_criteria: Obtain the delivery package from the representative.

objectives.description: Deliver the package to the designated contact at the Verdant Embassy.
objectives.completion_criteria: Successfully deliver the package to the contact.

objectives.description: Obtain 1 test_apple.
objectives.completion_criteria: Have at least 1 test_apple in inventory.

objectives.description: Defeat a wolf (test).
objectives.completion_criteria: Eliminate the wolf

objectives.description: Visit test_ancient_ruins.
objectives.completion_criteria: Enter the test_ancient_ruins location.

TEST_Q04.title: Q04 – Speak to the Test Elder

objectives.description: Speak with the test_elder.
objectives.completion_criteria: Conversation with test_elder completed.

objectives.description: Finish the timed task before 300s.
objectives.completion_criteria: Objective completed in under 300 seconds.

objectives.description: Finish the timed task after 600s.
objectives.completion_criteria: Objective completed after 600 seconds have elapsed.

objectives.description: Have test_key and defeat test_guardian.
objectives.completion_criteria: Gate opened with test_key and guardian defeated.

objectives.description: Visit test_dock OR test_harbor.
objectives.completion_criteria: Arrive at either test_dock or test_harbor.

objectives.description: Ensure alarm remains silent.
objectives.completion_criteria: Objective completed with no alarm raised.

objectives.description: Obtain test_badge.
objectives.completion_criteria: Acquire the test_badge.

objectives.description: Optionally visit test_outpost.
objectives.completion_criteria: Enter the test_outpost (optional).

objectives.description: Defeat test_bandit_captain.
objectives.completion_criteria: Defeat the test_bandit_captain.

objectives.description: Collect 3 test_gem.
objectives.completion_criteria: Possess 3 test_gem.

objectives.description: Convince the test_mayor to help.
objectives.completion_criteria: Mayor agrees to help.

TEST_Q13.title: Q13 – Semantic Mandatory + Optional DSL
TEST_Q13.description: Mandatory semantic objective and optional visit objective.

objectives.description: Broker peace between test_factions.
objectives.completion_criteria: Agreement reached between factions.

objectives.description: Optionally visit test_neutral_ground.
objectives.completion_criteria: Enter test_neutral_ground (optional).

TEST_Q14.title: Q14 – Flag Chain
TEST_Q14.description: Require both flags set (speak to guard and acquire pass).

objectives.description: Speak to guard and acquire pass.
objectives.completion_criteria: Guard spoken to and pass acquired.

objectives.description: Collect 3 test_herb.
objectives.completion_criteria: Possess 3 test_herb.

TEST_Q16.title: Q16 – Any of Three Enemies
TEST_Q16.description: Defeat any one of three test bandits.

objectives.description: Defeat any bandit (1 of 3).
objectives.completion_criteria: Defeat at least one of test_bandit_1/2/3.

objectives.description: Visit test_gate and test_keep.
objectives.completion_criteria: Enter both test_gate and test_keep.

objectives.description: Ensure test_banished is false.
objectives.completion_criteria: Status confirms not banished.

TEST_Q19.title: Q19 – Mixed All/Any
TEST_Q19.description: Travel to dock or harbor and have a test_ticket.

objectives.description: Visit test_dock or test_harbor and show test_ticket.
objectives.completion_criteria: Entry permitted with test_ticket at dock or harbor.

TEST_Q20.title: Q20 – Optional Does Not Block
TEST_Q20.description: Optional objective should not block completion.

objectives.description: Deliver test_letter.
objectives.completion_criteria: Deliver the test_letter to recipient.

objectives.description: Explore test_garden (optional).
objectives.completion_criteria: Enter the test_garden.

TEST_Q21.title: Q21 – Narrative-Heavy Objective
TEST_Q21.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the council.

objectives.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the test_council about unity and cooperation.
objectives.completion_criteria: Speech delivered; council acknowledges.

objectives.description: Defeat test_ogre.
objectives.completion_criteria: Ogre defeated.

objectives.description: Collect 2 test_ogre_tooth.
objectives.completion_criteria: Possess 2 test_ogre_tooth.

objectives.description: Visit test_ogre_cave.
objectives.completion_criteria: Enter the ogre cave.

TEST_Q23.title: Q23 – Semantic Failure Gating
TEST_Q23.description: Objective completion depends on semantic inference only.

objectives.description: Convince test_skeptic to trust you.
objectives.completion_criteria: Skeptic indicates trust.

TEST_Q24.title: Q24 – Abandon/Fallback Scenario
TEST_Q24.description: Regular quest for abandon/failure flow testing.

objectives.description: Recover the test_relic.
objectives.completion_criteria: Obtain the test_relic.

TEST_Q25.title: Q25 – Complex Mixed Conditions
TEST_Q25.description: Any of two routes, but no alarm and with resource gate.

objectives.description: Route A (visit test_tower AND have test_rope) OR Route B (defeat test_spider_queen) with no alarm.
objectives.completion_criteria: No alarm triggered; either tower+rope route or spider queen defeated.

metadata.description: Quest definitions for the RPG game world
